name: Battle Tower
description:
Turn-Based Fighting Game

How to play:

  • You can hover your mouse over fighters
  • You picking first your attack
  • Then you choosing defence stance
  • If your attack aiming your opponents defence stance Hands HP will be taken istead of fighter HP.
  • Your Head is important - if your head have 0 HP you will be stun for next round
  • Your Hands and Legs Attack Power depends on Hands and Legs HP
  • You can limit your opponent stamina by aiming for torso

I'm planning to add animations, but couldn't make it in time for game jam submission
